Interface Trainer<E extends EstimationFunction>

Type Parameters:
E - the type of EstimationFunction being trained
All Known Implementing Classes:
TrainerImpl
@DomainObject @Strategy(INTERFACE) public interface Trainer<E extends EstimationFunction>
Defines a configurable trainer for EstimationFunctions.

A Trainer encapsulates the core components of a training pipeline: an Initializer, an ObjectiveFunction, an Optimizer, and a Regime. By composing these elements, the trainer is able to initialize a model, compute loss and gradients, apply optimization steps, and control the overall training process.

This interface exposes getters and setters for each component, allowing dynamic reconfiguration of the training strategy. It also defines a train(EstimationFunction, DataSet) method as the entry point for executing the training process.

See Also:

  • ObjectiveFunction
  • Optimizer
  • Regime

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    Initializer<? super E>
    getInitializer()
    Returns the initializer used to prepare the estimation function prior to training.
    ObjectiveFunction
    getObjective()
    Returns the objective function used to evaluate and guide training.
    Optimizer<? super E>
    getOptimizer()
    Returns the optimizer used to update the parameters of the estimation function.
    Regime
    getRegime()
    Returns the regime that controls the overall training flow, such as batching and number of epochs.

      trainingSet - the dataset used for training

    • of

      static <E extends EstimationFunction> Trainer<E> of(Initializer<? super E> initializer, ObjectiveFunction objective, Optimizer<? super E> optimizer, Regime regime)
      Factory method for creating a new Trainer with the given components.

      This method constructs a TrainerImpl, configures it with the provided initializer, objective, optimizer, and regime, and returns it as a Trainer instance.

      Type Parameters:
      E - the type of estimation function to train
      Parameters:
      initializer - the initializer to use
      objective - the objective function to use
      optimizer - the optimizer to use
      regime - the training regime to use
      Returns:
      a configured trainer instance
